meaningMnemonic: Give some <radical>shellfish</radical> to a <radical>talent</radical>ed person and they'll have no problem accumulating <kanji>wealth</kanji>. People with talent can make money out of pretty much anything, so shellfish are like easy-mode.
readingMnemonic: This talented person really starts accumulating <kanji>wealth</kanji> when their <reading>cy</reading>borg (さい) is unveiled. It's a half-man, half-shellfish cyborg that plays the <reading>xy</reading>lophone , and everyone wants to buy it.
